collision(MovableCharacter, GameCell) - Static method in class ghost.CollisionGauge
This method is the main collision detection between walls and ghosts/waka, as well as functionality for fruit/superfruit/soda, returning a boolean based on if a collision has occurred
CollisionGauge - Class in ghost
Acts as the Collision manager between Game Cells
Contains methods for collision checks, turning at an intersection and detecting an intersection
CollisionGauge() - Constructor for class ghost.CollisionGauge
Initialises a new CollisionGauge object

E

EmptyCell - Class in ghost
Represents empty spaces in the game window
This serves no functionality other than a potential pathway for Waka
It can also act as a placeholder above and below the game map for game information
EmptyCell(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.EmptyCell
Initialises a new EmptyCell object

F

frighten(boolean) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Changes ghost frigtenened/unfrightened status
frightened - Variable in class ghost.Ghost
Ghost's state of being frightened or not
frightenedCounter - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
Game's counter for amount of time ghosts are frightened
frightenedLength - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
Game's amount of time for a ghost to be frightend from config file
Fruit - Class in ghost
Represents the Fruit object
Fruit can be consumed by Waka, upon which, disappears from the Game Map
In order to win, Waka must consume all fruit
Fruit(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.Fruit
Initialises a new Fruit object
fruitCount - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
Game's counter for amount of fruit unconsumed

G

GameCell - Class in ghost
Acts as the blueprint for all game objects
Hosts all methods and attributes required by cell types: name, sprite and cartesian coordinates at any given frame
GameCell(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.GameCell
Abstract constructor for classes inheriting from GameCell
gameEvent - Variable in class ghost.App
App gameEvent manager
GameEvent - Class in ghost
Acts as the engine for the game
Hosts all game information, to be supplied to the App window
GameEvent(App) - Constructor for class ghost.GameEvent
Initialises a new GameEvent object
gameFinishScreen(App, boolean, boolean) - Method in class ghost.GameEvent
Activates game finish screens for when the player either wins or loses
gameFont - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
Game's font for finished game screens
gameLogic(App) - Method in class ghost.GameEvent
Runs cell logic, as well as starting game finish screens when necessary and resetting the game
gameSetup() - Method in class ghost.GameEvent
Sets game attributes, as well as parsing the config file and the appropriate map to represent the game cells in window
getName() - Method in class ghost.GameCell
 
getXVel() - Method in class ghost.MovableCharacter
 
getYVel() - Method in class ghost.MovableCharacter
 
ghost - package ghost
 
Ghost - Class in ghost
Represents the game's antagonists, the Ghosts
Ghosts are programmed to hunt down Waka in specific patterns depending on type
Upon contact they kill Waka, but become vulnerable when Waka has consumed a Superfruit
Have two modes: Scatter (target a specific corner of the map) and Chase (target cells based on Waka's position)
Ghost(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.Ghost
Abstract constructor for classes inheriting from Ghost
ghostAI(int, int, GameEvent) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Logic for ghost movement in differing situations
ghostList - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
List of gamecells that are ghosts

H

HEIGHT - Static variable in class ghost.App
App window height

K

keyPressed() - Method in class ghost.App

Main method for entire app
map - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
Game's map from config file
MapParser - Class in ghost
Acts as the map parser, to set up game attributes and cells
Retrieves the supplied ASCII map and converts it into a list of cells
Loops through the list and converts it to game information
MapParser() - Constructor for class ghost.MapParser
Initialises a new MapParser object
modeInterval - Variable in class ghost.Ghost
Ghost's timeframe for mode
modeLengths - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
List of modelength times from config file
modeShiftCounter - Variable in class ghost.Ghost
Ghost's timer to determine when to switch mode
MovableCharacter - Class in ghost
Acts as the blueprint for movable characters
Hosts information such as velocity in both axes, as well as direction and attempted move
Also contains information such as vulnerability, and the effects of Soda
MovableCharacter(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.MovableCharacter
Abstract constructor for classes inheriting from MovableCharacter
move(String, GameEvent) - Method in class ghost.MovableCharacter
Controls character movement by changing direction of velocity, provided a change in direction would not result in a collision
moveAfterCollision(GameEvent) - Method in class ghost.MovableCharacter
Allows character movement as long as there is no collision
moveAttempt - Variable in class ghost.MovableCharacter
Character's attempted move
moveHandler(int) - Method in class ghost.Waka
User keyboard input is interpreted to move Waka

N

name - Variable in class ghost.GameCell
Hosts the gamecell's name
normalSprite - Variable in class ghost.Ghost
Ghost's normal coloured sprite

P

parse(GameEvent, String) - Method in class ghost.MapParser
Parses map and returns an ArrayList of game cell objects, which provide the functionality for the rest of the game
ParseJSON - Class in ghost
Acts as the json.config file parser
retrieving the game's map, Waka's lives and speed, and Ghost's frightened length and mode length intervals
ParseJSON() - Constructor for class ghost.ParseJSON
Initialises a new ParseJSON object

setup() - Method in class ghost.App
The setup() function is called once when the program starts.
skipMovement - Variable in class ghost.MovableCharacter
Determines whether character should move or not
Soda - Class in ghost
Represents the Soda object
Upon consumption by Waka, ghosts are placed in a "frightened" mode
Ghosts have randomised movement and maintain a "wavy" effect, however they can still kill Waka upon contact
Soda(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.Soda
Initialises a new Soda object
sodaEffect(boolean) - Method in class ghost.MovableCharacter
Sets Waka's drunk condition
spaceList - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
List of gamecells that a character can pass through
speed - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
Game's character speeds from config file
sprite - Variable in class ghost.GameCell
Hosts the gamecell's sprite
spriteTransition(GameEvent) - Method in class ghost.Waka
Changes Waka sprite depending on Waka conditions.
Superfruit - Class in ghost
Represents the Superfruit object
Upon consumption, Waka becomes invincible and can temporarily "kill" ghosts
Ghosts are placed in "frightened" mode and make randomised movement
If Waka is later killed, all dead ghosts are resurrected
Superfruit(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.Superfruit
Initialises a new Superfruit object
switchMode() - Method in class ghost.Ghost
Toggles between scatter and chase mode when gameEventropriate

T

Top() - Method in class ghost.GameCell
 
turnCheck(GameEvent, MovableCharacter, String) - Static method in class ghost.CollisionGauge
This method provides functionality for turns at intersection, returning a boolean based on if a character can make the turn

U

unconsumed - Variable in class ghost.Fruit
Contains the state of a fruit's consumption

W

waka - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
Game's Waka
Waka - Class in ghost
Represents the game's protagonist, Waka
Waka is user-controlled via keyboard input, who must guide Waka safely through the maze to consume all fruit and avoid Ghosts
The player wins if Waka can consume all fruit, and loses if Waka doesn't have remaining lives
Waka(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.Waka
Initialises a new Waka object
Wall - Class in ghost
Represents the Wall object
Walls are impenetrable, and blocks both Waka and Ghosts from moving through
Different wall shapes exist in order to make complete mazes
Wall(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.Wall
Initialises a new Wall object
wallKey(String) - Static method in class ghost.MapParser
Associates wall type with specified number
wallList - Variable in class ghost.GameEvent
List of gamecells that are walls
Whim - Class in ghost
Represents the Whim ghost object.
Whim(PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.Whim
Initialises a new Whim object
WIDTH - Static variable in class ghost.App
App window width

Y
